plot: The struggling musician son of a dead Elvis-like singing star becomes a private detective when his father's bronzed nose hairs are stolen from a rock and roll museum.
title: Rock and the Money-Hungry Party Girls
plot_es: The struggling musician son of a dead Elvis-like singing star becomes a private detective when his father's bronzed nose hairs are stolen from a rock and roll museum.
original_name: Rock and the Money-Hungry Party Girls
plot_en: The struggling musician son of a dead Elvis-like singing star becomes a private detective when his father's bronzed nose hairs are stolen from a rock and roll museum.
